name: Doomclick
description:
Entry to the Clicker game jam.

Pistol, Shotgun and Chain gun shoots automatically ones you've unlocked them.  

There might be some bugs, didn't have time to check for everything.

Credit:

Art and sound effects: Made by the people over at https://freedoom.github.io/index.html. 

Music:

Title: Lark

Author: Joseph Gilbert / Kistol

URL:  https://opengameart.org/content/lark
